body:
The original version number containing dat suffix like `20151007-1312Z`. I remove it and kept only the digital version numbers `2.4.10`. This makes the version number more clear but the date suffix displays as remote versions when running `spack version sctk`:

```
spack versions sctk                                                                                                                                                => Safe versions (already checksummed):
  2.4.10  2.4.9  2.4.8  2.4.0
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  20151007-1  20141015-1  20130429-2  20091110-0
```
title: Add package sctk.
